forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds softly over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle embrace of clouds lingers above, wrapping the city in a cool, ethereal shroud. With temperatures hovering around fifty-two degrees, an invigorating west wind stirs, rustling the leaves and hinting at the bright sunny promise that Saturday holds. The forecast whispers of clear skies to come, with the sun reaching its zenith near sixty-two degrees before softly descending into the soothing chill of the afternoon.

As the day transitions, one might notice hints of a marine layer clinging to the coastline, where the iconic Golden Gate Bridge stands silhouetted against a backdrop of shifting hues. For an outing, a light jacket or sweater would be wise, perfect for the cool midday breeze that might nudge its way past layers. An invitation to explore beckons—with a walk along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet moment savoring a coffee at an outdoor café while watching the world drift by. For those who find joy in simple pleasures, this day offers a gentle canvas, urging you to revel in its subtleties.
